de.jannlab.training

Class NetTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.training.NetTrainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GradientDescent, RandomSearch

    public abstract class NetTrainer
extends Object
    This class is the base class for all Traininer classes, and contains general variables and methods which they are all sharing.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
